metadata.description: The son of a Bat and a Demon, Damian al Ghul has set out to forge his own destiny-and atone for the shameful Year of Blood! Will he be aided or hindered by the behemoth Goliath? And what mysterious legacy trails behind him? Join writer/artist Patrick Gleason as he chronicles the globe-hopping adventures of ROBIN: SON OF BATMAN!
metadata.name: Robin: Son of Batman
